attributes.additional_details:
This video says it all:

http://youtu.be/qlTA3rnpgzU

We NEED to implement this in the UK, and I would like HMG to consider leading the world in implementing this technology as soon as possible.

The benefits of implementing this technology (some shown in the video) are countless, and I would like to see HMG set processes in motion to enable the UK to implement it as soon as possible. Money ear-marked for HS2 would be far better spent on this kind of nationwide infrastructure improvement.
